bio:
Ying Song is an Instructor of Chinese Language at NYU Shanghai. Prior to joining NYU Shanghai, she worked as a Chinese instructor in Shanghai University of Engineering Science and East China Normal University. She holds an MA and a BA from East China Normal University.

Professor Song has been teaching foreigners Chinese for more than four years. 

Research Interests

  • Teaching Chinese as a second language
  • Second language acquisition

Courses Taught

  • Elementary Chinese I
  • Elementary Chinese II
  • Intermediate Chinese I
  • Practical Chinese and Introduction to China

Education

  • MA, Teaching Chinese as a Foreign Language, East China Normal University, 2013
  • BA, Teaching Chinese as a Foreign Language, East China Normal University, 2010
